Class WaterPipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • dungeonadventure.items.Item
      • dungeonadventure.items.WaterPipe
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Inspectable, Nameable, Threadable, Timeable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable

    public class WaterPipe
extends Item
implements java.lang.Runnable, Threadable, java.io.Serializable, Timeable
    Water pipe. Starts breaking on spawn, and letting this break results in game over
    Author:
    Mikko Piuhola
